mapper.insert: insert into business_owner_car(car_color, car_brand, car_type, operate, car_num, ps_id, remark, owner_id, b_id, user_id, car_id, community_id, start_time, end_time, state, car_type_cd, member_id) values (#{carColor}, #{carBrand}, #{carType}, #{operate}, #{carNum}, #{psId}, #{remark}, #{ownerId}, #{bId}, #{userId}, #{carId}, #{communityId}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{state}, #{carTypeCd}, #{memberId})
